#summary Export your data to several formats

=Introduction=

This pages will only guide you trough the process of configuring all options need for exporting you grid data.


<font color="red">*IMPORTANT*: </font> 

You have two ways of configuring your output format. 

 # - When creating the grid instance 
{{{
$grid = Bvb_Grid_Data::factory('Bvb_Grid_Deploy_*',array());
}}}
 # - Automatically done after receiving a GET param _`_exportTo`_ with the last part of deploy class (json, print, excel, word, etc, etc) 

==JSON==

The JSON output format takes no arguments, so all you need to do is:

{{{
$grid = Bvb_Grid_Data::factory('Bvb_Grid_Deploy_Json',array());
$grid->setSource()..//
}}}
